attributes.title: UGLY❤️
attributes.review: don’t download this it’s the worst game ive ever played 😖i don’t know why you would make this a game 😠the orange guy scared me 😢and i didn’t get the point of the whole game🤨

attributes.title: It made my fish die
attributes.review: The app is AWEFUL do NOT download this my fish took one quick glance at my phone when I was walking him and he died shame on you trump you owe me a new fish

attributes.title: Never downloaded this again
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to stan the orange daddy but when I open the app I saw my moms nudes. I have never been more disgusted in my life. 😔

attributes.title: Glitched my phone
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to see why trump supporters are getting it but once I downloaded it my whole house smelt like old spray tan and stanky hot Cheetos so I delete the app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD
The racist vibes that were coming off of Trump’s picture made my phone explode. I’m currently using my toaster to post this review. Thank you.

attributes.title: really bad ✨
attributes.review: are u really supporting a racist, homophobic, rapist? cmon america we can do MUCH better then this. anyways, do NOT buy this app it’s terrible and should be deleted off the App Store 😘

attributes.title: So disappointed
attributes.review: I came here to find out more about Trump plans for the US but I knew that he a 🍊racist bunker boy idk how his fans are so loyal but his fans are 👩‍🦯 and also racist

attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because i love and support our racist and misogynistic president. But it started making my phone die and gave it a whole bunch of viruses😖. WORST APP EVER

attributes.title: It’s terrible
attributes.review: I saw that my child was playing on her iPad and then this game pops up. Then she saw a orange Cheeto pufff and was so scared for her life. Please take app of scary for young children and adults

attributes.title: Was expecting Bunker Boy, not this
attributes.review: The app honestly is horrific. Instead  of giving me news about the Most Amazinng prez we’ve ever had it gave me weird photos of this ra_ist (c or p)
